channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Navies Go to War with the Fleets They Possess
item.description: Congress must focus on shoring up the Navy’s operational strategy and its industrial base in the next U.S. defense budget.

item.description: The latest leftist gerrymander stunt should serve as a reminder to Republicans that failure to rewrite representation lines is not an option.

item.title: Trump says he's settled on a Federal Reserve chair pick and will announce it soon
item.description: President Trump says he knows who he will appoint to lead the Federal Reserve.

item.title: The K-shaped economy means inflation hurts at the bottom and swells the assets at the top
item.description: “We had that kind of two-year period where the bottom was catching up and that talk of the K-shape went away,” said TSLombard economist Dario Perkins.

item.title: IBM exec asks job candidates whether they think we are in an AI bubble as a make-or-break interview test
item.description: Do you think we’re in an AI Bubble? Even the experts can’t agree. And weirdly, your opinion on all this could decide whether you get the job.

item.description: Tennessee special election tests Trump's influence as Democrat Aftyn Behn challenges GOP in a red district.
